articleList.title: What are some fun places go around the Chicago, Illinois area?
articleList.desc: Play zone (toy store) in Harlem Irving plaza mall in norridge illinois . It has fantastic toys and 8 animal rides.

articleList.title: Why are there so many ladyboys in Asia especially in Thailand and Philippines?
articleList.desc: In the Philippines, there is a bit of a weird attitude from society towards homosexuality. Gay people are regarded as somehow “feminine souls stuck in a male body.

articleList.title: What are the biggest culture shocks people face when coming to Germany?
articleList.desc: I was in Dresden, Germany sometime ago and went to the McDonald’s to have a burger and a cold drink. Then I saw a young man ordering a beer!

articleList.title: Why is Dubai called a fake city?
articleList.desc: I’ve spent time in both Dubai and Las Vegas. Dubai looks like Las Vegas without the casinos.

articleList.title: What happens if you throw something off a cruise ship?
articleList.desc: You get in trouble for it.This guy threw himself overboard and got his whole party banned from the cruise line for life.
